level.heading: Presumption that rule of law continues unchanged.
level.text: Unless a change in law has clearly been made, the provisions of this act shall be deemed declaratory of the meaning of the Uniform Commercial Code, effective January 1, 1965.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 4-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 28:11-101.

level.heading: References in text
level.text: “This act”, referred to in this section, is D.C. Law 4-85.
